dict.string: #!/usr/bin/env ruby require ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"] + "/lib/exit_codes.rb" require ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"] + "/lib/dialog.rb" phrase = STDIN.read CMD = '"$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/bin"/LatexCitekeys.rb -full=true ' + (phrase == "" ? "" : "-p=#{phrase} " ) + '"$TM_LATEX_BIB" "$TM_LATEX_MASTER" "$TM_FILEPATH"' res = `#{CMD}` TextMate.exit_discard if res == "" items = res.scan(/'(.*?)'(,|\z)/).map{|i| i[0]} choice = items[0] if items.length > 1 choice = Dialog.menu(items) TextMate.exit_discard if choice.nil? choice = items[choice] end print choice.slice(/^[^%]+/).strip
